DecisionMaker.name: process_request
DecisionMaker.description: Processes the initial request, prepares the response data, and marks the request as processed.

output_updates.name: response_data
output_updates.description: The data content ready to be sent as a response

output_updates.name: status
output_updates.description: Indicates the processing status of the request

Communicator.name: send_response
Communicator.description: Sends the prepared response to the environment and updates the transmission status.

required_variables.name: response_data
required_variables.description: The data content ready to be sent as a response

required_variables.name: status
required_variables.description: Indicates the processing status of the request

output_updates.name: status
output_updates.description: Indicates the success status of response transmission

output_updates.name: response_data
output_updates.description: The data that was successfully sent to the environment
